General.Name: Hebei Gongda Keya Energy Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hebei Gongda Keya Energy Technology Co.,Ltd., a software company, provides heating operation management and heating energy-saving technical services in China and internationally. It offers heating intelligent management platforms for government heating authorities; heating monitoring platforms for heating companies, including software and hardware serialized products; and smart heating information platform. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, China.
General.Address: Building 9, Runjiang Headquarters International, Shijiazhuang, China, 050000
